Krish Ramoju

Student at Chaitanya Bharati Institute of Technology

Summary

First of extracurricular activities. I was vice captain in 8th grade followed by 9th and 10th. I have a bronze level International Award for Young People certificate. I have taken part in 8 Model United Nations, winning Outstanding Delegate twice in Sancta Maria's Model United Nations. I also participated in Harvard Online Model United Nations among others.

About my academic achievements so far, I was the Salutatorian of my batch at Sancta Maria. I have followed a Cambridge curriculum throughout my student life, part of it at the International British School of Alexandria in Egypt. I was an IGCSE as well as A Level High Achiever. I have a 98.14 JEE Mains percentile and I would like to point out the shortage of students from a Cambridge background to pursue this entrance examination. I am a Computer Science core engineering student at Chaitanya Bharati Institute of Technology at present. Clearly, I have shown to be quite a successful learner both academically and elsewhere.
